shinyLimma - a web app for bioinformatics

Based off of Gordon Smythe's famous differential expression analysis package!

Let's get to work!

Your pain free introduction to Bioinformatics!

shinyLimma has everything you need to start doing differential expression in no time - no knowledge of coding required! Once you're done, just download the code shinyLimma produced and you can share it with the bioinformatics community at large.

Get Started!

shinyLimma is...

Lightweight

Being a single paged application makes this easy to host on a server or use on your own machine

Reproducible

One click downloads the code produced by your shinyLimma session, making your results easy to reproduce and share

Easy To Use

Perfect for an introduction to Bioinformatics

Open Source

Extend the project and edit it to make it suit your needs - there's nothing you can't make yours
